    • Method Detail

      • readName

        public static java.lang.String readName(java.util.Scanner kb)
        The readName method reads the users name from the keyboard. The method ensures a name has been entered that is not empty.
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing the Scanner to the keyboard object
        Returns:
        String Representing a non-empty user name
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Scanner is null
        Post_Condition:
        The input buffer will be empty

      • goAgain

        public static boolean goAgain(java.util.Scanner kb)
        The goAgain method prompts the user to go again and ensures the value entered is yes or no
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing the Scanner to the keyboard object
        Returns:
        boolean Representing yes to go again or no to quit
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Scanner is null
        Post_Condition:
        The input buffer will be empty

      • readWord

        public static java.lang.String readWord(java.util.Scanner kb,
                                        java.lang.String name)
        The readWord method prompts the user to enter a word and then ensures the word is at least 5 characters in length.
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing the Scanner to the keyboard object
        name - Representing the players name
        Returns:
        String Representing a String of 5 characters of the word to guess
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Scanner is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or empty
        Post_Condition:
        The input buffer will be empty

      • convertWordToArray

        public static char[] convertWordToArray(java.lang.String theWord)
        The converWordToArray will convert the passed in String into a char array. In the String class there is toCharArray. You CAN'T use it. You must make a char array and copy the letters from the String into the char array and then return the char array.
        Parameters:
        theWord - Representing the String to be converted to a char array
        Returns:
        char [] Representing the String passed in as a character array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the String passed in is null or empty
